title: Can't download league | Windows | ( Another instance of the league of legends client is running.)
body: So I was having some trouble opening up my client ( I would double click and nothing would happen ) so I decide that I would just re download and I thought it would just fix it since it has in the past so I did but now when I download league my computer says "Another instance of the league of legends client is running. Please close it and try again" please help me fix this

replies.body:
I'd recommend rebooting your computer, then launching league from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file (right-click, *run as admin*) inside your installation directory (should be in **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**) to ensure League can operate properly.

If you still encounter this issue after taking those actions, please let me know.
